rationale: The agent's diff is identical to the ground truth diff. Both add the import for SwedishLightStemFilter and change the return statement from SpanishLightStemFilter to SwedishLightStemFilter on line 155. The fix correctly addresses the bug where light_swedish/lightSwedish language configuration was incorrectly returning the Spanish stemmer instead of the Swedish one. No extra changes, no missing changes, no unsolicited documentation - the implementation matches the ground truth exactly.
